CVE-2014-0002.title: Apache Camel CVE-2014-0002 XML External Entity Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0002.body: Apache Camel is prone to an XML External Entity vulnerability.                                                                               An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information from the application; this may lead to further attacks.                                            The following versions are affected:                Apache Camel 2.11.0 through 2.11.3        Apache Camel 2.12.0 through 2.12.2

CVE-2014-0003.title: Apache Camel CVE-2014-0003 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0003.body: Apache Camel is prone to remote code execution vulnerability.                                                           Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application.                                            The following versions are affected:                          Apache Camel 2.11.0 through 2.11.3             Apache Camel 2.12.0 through 2.12.2

CVE-2014-0019.title: socat PROXY-CONNECT Address Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0019.body: socat is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied input.       An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible; this has not been confirmed.     socat versions 1.3.0.0 through 1.7.2.2 and 2.0.0-b1 through 2.0.0-b6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0034.title: Apache CXF SAML Tokens Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0034.body: Apache CXF is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability.                                                              An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and gain unauthorized access; this may aid in launching further attacks.                                  The following versions are affected:            Apache CXF 2.6.x  prior to 2.6.12      Apache CXF 2.7.x prior to 2.7.9

CVE-2014-0054.title: Spring Framework CVE-2014-0054 Multiple XML External Entity Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-0054.body: Spring Framework is prone to multiple XML External Entity injection vulnerabilities.                      Attackers can exploit these issues to obtain potentially sensitive information. This may lead to further attacks.                      The following versions are vulnerable:                      Spring MVC 3.0.0 through 3.2.7           Spring MVC 4.0.0 through 4.0.1                Note: This issue is the result of an incomplete fixes for the issues described in BID 61951 (Spring Framework CVE-2013-4152 Multiple XML External Entity Injection Vulnerabilities) and BID 64947 (Spring Framework CVE-2013-6429 Multiple XML External Entity Injection   Vulnerabilities).

CVE-2014-0058.title: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform Plain Text Password Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0058.body: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability.                                                Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information such as user credentials that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2014-0093.title: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform Java Security Manager Policy Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0093.body: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability.        An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2014-0116.title: Apache Struts 'CookieInterceptor' Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0116.body: Apache Struts is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability.                                                        An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks.                                              Apache Struts versions 2.0.0 through 2.3.16.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0128.title: Squid CVE-2014-0128 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0128.body: Squid is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability.                                                                    Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions.                                            Versions prior to Squid 3.3.12 and 3.4.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0130.title: Ruby on Rails 'implicit render' Functionality Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0130.body: Ruby on Rails is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability.                                                  A remote attacker could exploit the vulnerability using  directory-traversal characters ('../') to access arbitrary files that  contain sensitive information.

CVE-2014-0133.title: nginx SPDY Implementation Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0133.body: nginx is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability.            Successful exploitation of this issue allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application, failed exploit attempts may lead to denial-of-service.            nginx 1.3.15 through 1.4.7 and 1.5.0 through 1.5.12 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0136.title: Red Hat CloudForms Management Engine 'get/log' Method Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0136.body: Red Hat CloudForms Management Engine is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability.                          Attackers can leverage this issue to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2014-0157.title: OpenStack Dashboard (Horizon) CVE-2014-0157 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-0157.body: OpenStack Dashboard (Horizon) is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.                An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2014-0199.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0199.body: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability.                                        Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information such as user credentials that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2014-0200.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager CVE-2014-0200 Insecure File Permissions Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0200.body: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager is prone to an local insecure-file-permissions vulnerability.A local attacker can exploit this issue by gaining access to a  world-readable file and extracting sensitive information from it.  Information obtained may aid in other attacks.      Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization 3.3 is vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0218.title: Moodle CVE-2014-0218 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0218.body: Moodle is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.                                                                                    An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.            Moodle versions 2.6 through 2.6.2, 2.5 through 2.5.5, and 2.4 through 2.4.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0220.title: Cloudera Manager CVE-2014-0220 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0220.body: Cloudera Manager is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.                                                                                                      Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks.                        Cloudera Manager prior to 4.8.3 and 5.0.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0240.title: Apache 'mod_wsgi' Module Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0240.body: mod_wsgi module is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers could exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges. Versions prior to mod_wsgi 3.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0242.title: Apache 'mod_wsgi' Module CVE-2014-0242 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0242.body: mod_wsgi is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2014-0514.title: Adobe Reader for Android Multiple Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-0514.body: Adobe Reader for Android is prone to multiple arbitrary code-execution vulnerabilities. An attacker can leverage these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Successful exploits will compromise the application and possibly the underlying device. Adobe Reader for Android 11.1.3 is vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0529.title: Adobe Acrobat and Reader CVE-2014-0529 Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0529.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions. The following products are affected: Adobe Reader 11.x versions prior to 11.0.07 Adobe Reader 10.x versions prior to 10.1.10 Adobe Acrobat 11.x versions prior to 11.0.07 Adobe Acrobat 10.x versions prior to 10.1.10

CVE-2014-0582.title: Adobe Flash Player and AIR CVE-2014-0582 Unspecified Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0582.body: Adobe Flash Player and AIR are prone to an unspecified heap-based buffer-overflow. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-0583.title: Adobe Flash Player and AIR CVE-2014-0583 Unspecified Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0583.body: Adobe Flash Player and AIR are prone to an unspecified heap-based buffer-overflow. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-0589.title: Adobe Flash Player and AIR CVE-2014-0589 Unspecified Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0589.body: Adobe Flash Player and AIR are prone to an unspecified heap-based buffer-overflow. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-0595.title: Novell Open Enterprise Server 'nwrights' Utility Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0595.body: Novell Open Enterprise Server is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain unauthorized access. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2014-0598.title: Novell Open Enterprise Server CVE-2014-0598 Unspecified Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0598.body: Novell Open Enterprise Server is prone to an unspecified directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this issue using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access arbitrary files that contain sensitive information. Information harvested may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to May 2014 OES11SP1 Scheduled Maintenance Update 9151 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0620.title: Technicolor TC7200 Cross Site Scripting and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-0620.body: Technicolor TC7200 is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and an HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Technicolor TC7200 STD6.01.12 is vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0632.title: EMC VPLEX GeoSynchrony CVE-2014-0632 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0632.body: EMC VPLEX GeoSynchrony is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit the vulnerability using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access arbitrary files that contain sensitive information. Information harvested may aid in launching further attacks. EMC VPLEX GeoSynchrony 4.0 through versions 5.2.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0636.title: RSA BSAFE Micro Edition Suite CVE-2014-0636 Chain Processing Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0636.body: RSA BSAFE Micro Edition Suite is prone to a chain-processing vulnerability due to incorrect certificate chain processing logic. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to create improper authenticated SSL connections, which will aid in further attacks. RSA BSAFE Micro Edition Suite (MES) 4.0.x versions prior to 4.0.5 and 3.2.x version prior to 3.2.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0726.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager IP Manager Assistant Interface SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0726.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. A successful exploit may allow an authenticated attacker to compromise the affected application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCum05326.

An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. phpMyID 0.9 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2925.title: ASUS RT-AC68U 'apply.cgi' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2925.body: ASUS RT-AC68U router is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2014-2989.title: TOA Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2989.body: TOA is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because it does not properly validate HTTP requests. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. TOA 2.5.6 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-2993.title: Birebin.com for Android CVE-2014-2993 X.509 Certificate Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2993.body: Birebin.com for Android is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly validate SSL certificates. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks.

CVE-2014-3006.title: Sitepark Information Enterprise Server CVE-2014-3006 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3006.body: Sitepark Information Enterprise Server is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability.An attacker may exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Sitepark Information Enterprise Server 2.9 through 2.9.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3088.title: IBM Sametime Meeting Server Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3088.body: IBM Sametime Meeting Server is prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers upload arbitrary files. The issue occurs because the application fails to adequately validate user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to upload arbitrary code and execute it in the context of the Web server process. This may facilitate unauthorized access or privilege escalation; other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2014-3100.title: Android KeyStore Service CVE-2014-3100 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3100.body: Android is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application and disclose sensitive information related to credentials. Android 4.3 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3111.title: FOG CVE-2014-3111 Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-3111.body: FOG is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. FOG 0.27 through versions 0.32 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3123.title: WordPress NextCellent Gallery Plugin CVE-2014-3123 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-3123.body: WordPress NextCellent Gallery plugin is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. NextCellent Gallery 1.9.13 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-3127.title: dpkg CVE-2014-3127 Incomplete Fix Local Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3127.body: dpkg is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting this issue will allow local attackers to modify files outside the destination directory and possibly gain access to the system. Note: This issue exists due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2014-0471 (identified in BID 67106-dpkg CVE-2014-0471 Local Directory Traversal Vulnerability).

CVE-2014-3130.title: SAP BASIS Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3130.body: SAP BASIS is prone to a security bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and to gain unauthorized actions.

CVE-2014-3131.title: SAP Solution Manager Profile Maintenance Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3131.body: SAP Solution Manager is prone to a security bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. SAP Solution Manager 7.1 is vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3132.title: SAP Solution Manager Background Processing Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3132.body: SAP Solution Manager is prone to a security bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. SAP Solution Manager 7.1 is vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3133.body: SAP NetWeaver Portal WD is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2014-3134.title: SAP BusinessObjects Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3134.body: SAP BusinessObjects is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2014-3149.title: IP.Board And IP.Nexus Arbitrary File Include and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-3149.body: IP.Board and IP.Nexus are prone to an arbitrary file-include vulnerability and cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, and open or run arbitrary files in the context of the web server process.

CVE-2014-3164.title: Google Android CVE-2014-3164 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3164.body: Google Android is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-3208.body: akpop3d is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to crash the affected application causing denial of service condition.

CVE-2014-3209.title: ldns CVE-2014-3209 Local Insecure File Permissions Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3209.body: ldns is prone to a local insecure-file-permissions vulnerability; fixes are available. A local attacker can exploit this issue by gaining access to a world-readable file and extracting sensitive information from it. Information obtained may aid in other attacks.

CVE-2014-3215.title: policycoreutils seunshare CVE-2014-3215 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3215.body: The policycoreutils is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers may exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges, to cause a denial-of-service condition or to modify data. policycoreutils 2.2.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-3242.title: SOAPpy XML External Entity Injection and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-3242.body: SOAPpy is prone to an XML External Entity injection vulnerability and a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit these issues to obtain potentially sensitive information or cause denial-of-service conditions. This may lead to further attacks. SOAPpy 0.12.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-3243.title: SOAPpy XML External Entity Injection and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-3243.body: SOAPpy is prone to an XML External Entity injection vulnerability and a denial-of-service vulnerability. SOAPpy 0.12.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-3246.body: Collabtive is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Collabtive 1.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-3247.body: Collabtive is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Collabtive 1.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

When an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site; this may aid in phishing attacks. Other attacks are also possible. Zenoss Monitoring System 4.2.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also affected.

CVE-2014-6435.title: Multiple Aztech Routers '/cgi-bin/AZ_Retrain.cgi' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-6435.body: Multiple Aztech routers are prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers may exploit this issue to cause an affected device to crash, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Aztech DSL5018EN, DSL705E and DSL705EU are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-6436.title: Multiple Aztech Modem Routers Session Hijacking Vulnerability
CVE-2014-6436.body: Multiple Aztech Modem Routers are prone to a session-hijacking vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access to the affected device.

CVE-2014-6437.title: Aztech Modem Routers Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-6437.body: Aztech Modem Routers are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information; this may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2014-6439.title: Elasticsearch CVE-2014-6439 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-6439.body: Elasticsearch is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain potentially sensitive information. This may lead to further attacks. Versions prior to Elasticsearch 1.4.0 beta 1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-6616.title: Softing FG-100 PB PROFIBUS  'DEVICE_NAME' Parameter HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-6616.body: Softing FG-100 PB PROFIBUS is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Softing FG-100 PB running firmware FG-x00-PB_V2.02.0.00 is vulnerable.

CVE-2014-7137.title: Dolibarr CVE-2014-7137 Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-7137.body: Dolibarr is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. An attacker can exploit these issues to compromise the affected application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Dolibarr 3.5.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-7139.title: WordPress Contact Form DB Plugin Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-7139.body: The Contact Form DB plugin for WordPress is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Contact Form DB 2.8.13 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-7182.body: WordPress WP Google Maps plugin is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. JobControl 2.14.0 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-9094.body: Geutebruck G-Cam and G-Code are prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability and multiple OS command-injection vulnerabilities.Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user and inject and execute arbitrary commands. CVE-2014-9263.body: 3S Pocketnet VMS is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application (typically Internet Explorer) using the ActiveX control. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-9265.title: Samsung SmartViewer 'CNC_Ctrl' ActiveX Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9265.body: Samsung SmartViewer is prone to a stack buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input before copying it into a fixed-size buffer. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application (typically Internet Explorer) using the ActiveX control. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-9266.body: Samsung SmartViewer is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application (typically Internet Explorer) using the ActiveX control.

CVE-2014-9267.body: PTC IsoView Activex Control is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. CVE-2014-9902.title: Google Nexus Qualcomm Wi-Fi driver CVE-2014-9902 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9902.body: Google Nexus is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. This issue is being tracked by Android-ID A-2866863.

CVE-2014-9909.body: Google Android is prone to multiple privilege escalation vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute code with elevated privileges. These issues are being tracked by Android Bug IDs A-31676542, and A-31746399.

CVE-2014-9913.title: Info-ZIP UnZip CVE-2014-9913 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9913.body: Info-ZIP UnZip is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2014-0001.title: Oracle MySQL Client 'main()' Function Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0001.body: MySQL is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails  to adequately bounds-check when processing server information.              Attackers can exploit this  issue to execute arbitrary code within the  context of the application.  Failed attacks may cause a denial-of-service  condition.

CVE-2014-0004.title: Udisks and Udisks2 Long Path Names Local Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0004.body: Udisks and Udisks2 prone to a local stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because they fail to properly validate user-supplied input before copying it into a fixed-length buffer.                                                                                           Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-0015.title: cURL/libcURL NTLM connection Remote Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0015.body: cURL/libcURL is prone to a remote security-bypass vulnerability.                                                   An attacker can leverage this issue to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.                                                                cURL/libcURL 7.10.6 through versions 7.34.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0018.title: Multiple Red Hat JBoss Products Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0018.body: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform and JBoss WildFly Application Server are prone to a local security bypass vulnerability.                            An attacker can exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access  to the MSC service registry of affected application, this may lead to  further attacks.                                    Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform (JBEAP) 6.2.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-0022.title: Yum 'yum-cron/yum-cron.py' Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0022.body: Yum is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability.                  An attacker can leverage this issue to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2014-0032.title: Apache Subversion 'mod_dav_svn' Module SVNListParentPath Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0032.body: Apache Subversion is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability due to an error in the 'mod_dav_svn' module.                                              Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application, denying further service to legitimate users.

CVE-2014-0033.title: Apache Tomcat CVE-2014-0033 Session Fixation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0033.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to a session-fixation vulnerability.                                                                                                                              An attacker can exploit this issue to hijack an arbitrary session and gain unauthorized access to the affected application.                                                                                                                              Tomcat  versions 6.0.33 through 6.0.37 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0038.title: Linux Kernel 'compat_sys_recvmmsg()' Function Local Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0038.body: The Linux Kernel is prone to a local memory-corruption vulnerability.                                                                                                                                            A local attacker can exploit  this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges, corrupt the kernel memory, obtain sensitive information or crash the kernel, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.                                                            Linux kernel 3.4 and above are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0045.title: Mumble CVE-2014-0045 Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0045.body: Mumble is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability.                                                                                                                                              Successful exploits will allow attackers to crash an affected application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of these issues, code execution may be possible; however, it has not been confirmed.                          Mumble 1.2.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-0046.title: Ember 'link-to' Helper Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0046.body: Ember framework is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.                                                        An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.          Ember 1.2.0, 1.2.1, 1.3.0 and 1.3.1 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-0050.title: Apache Commons FileUpload CVE-2014-0050 Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0050.body: Apache Commons FileUpload is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the application to enter an infinite loop which may cause denial-of-service conditions.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The following products are vulnerable:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Apache Commons FileUpload 1.0 through versions 1.3                                                                                                                                  Apache Tomcat 8.0.0-RC1 through versions 8.0.1                                                                                                                                  Apache Tomcat 7.0.0 through versions 7.0.50

CVE-2014-0053.title: Pivotal Grails 'grails-resources' Plugin Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0053.body: Pivotal Grails is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Pivotal Grails 2.0.0 through 2.3.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0063.title: PostgreSQL CVE-2014-0063 Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0063.body: PostgreSQL is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer.                    Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.                    Versions prior to PostgreSQL 9.3.3, 9.2.7, 9.1.12, 9.0.16, and 8.4.20 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0064.title: PostgreSQL CVE-2014-0064 Multiple Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities

Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.                            Versions prior to PostgreSQL 9.3.3, 9.2.7, 9.1.12, 9.0.16, and 8.4.20 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0065.title: PostgreSQL CVE-2014-0065 Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

CVE-2014-0282.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer CVE-2014-0282 Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0282.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability due to a use-after-free condition. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. Internet Explorer 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 and 11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0283.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-0290.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-0293.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer CVE-2014-0293 Cross Domain Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0293.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a cross-domain information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to view content from a browser window in another domain or security zone. This may allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or aid in further attacks.

CVE-2014-0294.title: Microsoft Forefront Protection for Exchange Server CVE-2014-0294 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0294.body: Microsoft Forefront Protection for Exchange Server is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-0295.title: Microsoft .NET Framework CVE-2014-0295 ASLR Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0295.body: Microsoft .NET Framework is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and execute arbitrary code by exploiting another vulnerability in the application.

CVE-2014-0296.title: Microsoft Windows Remote Desktop Protocol CVE-2014-0296 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0296.body: Microsoft Windows Remote Desktop Protocol is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2014-0318.title: Microsoft Windows Kernel 'Win32k.sys' CVE-2014-0318 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0318.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges and gain access to kernel memory.

CVE-2014-0330.title: Dell KACE K1000 Systems Management Appliance 'LABEL_ID' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0330.body: Dell KACE K1000 systems management appliance is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Dell KACE K1000 systems management appliance 5.5.90545 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-0331.title: Fortinet FortiADC 'locale' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0331.body: Fortinet FortiADC is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. FortiADC versions 3.2.0 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0332.title: Multiple Dell SonicWALL Products '/sgms/mainPage' Page Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0332.body: Multiple Dell SonicWALL products are prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. The following products prior to version 7.1 SP1 are vulnerable: Dell SonicWALL Global Management System Dell SonicWALL Analyzer Dell SonicWALL Universal Management Appliance E5000

CVE-2014-0334.title: CMS Made Simple CVE-2014-0334 Multiple Cross Site Scripting and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-0334.body: CMS Made Simple is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities and multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied inputs. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2014-0338.title: WatchGuard Fireware XTM 'poll_name' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0338.body: WatchGuard Fireware XTM is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Fireware XTM versions 11.8.1 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0339.title: Webmin 'view.cgi' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0339.body: Webmin is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Webmin 1.670 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-0341.title: PivotX CVE-2014-0341 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-0341.body: PivotX is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. PivotX 2.3.8 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-0344.title: ManageEngine OpStor Cross Site Scripting And Privilege Escalation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-0344.body: ManageEngine OpStor is prone to cross-site scripting and privilege-escalation vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues gain elevated privileges, execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. ManageEngine Build prior to 8500 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0351.title: Fortinet FortiOS CVE-2014-0351 Man in the Middle Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0351.body: Fortinet FortiOS is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform man-in-the-middle attacks and disclose sensitive information. Successful exploits will lead to other attacks.

CVE-2014-0362.title: Google Search Appliance Dynamic Navigation Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0362.body: Google Search Appliance is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Google Search Appliance versions prior 7.2.0.G.114 and prior 7.0.14.G.216 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0397.title: Oracle Solaris CVE-2014-0397 Remote Security Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0397.body: Oracle Solaris is prone to a remote security vulnerability. The 'libXtsol' sub component is affected. This vulnerability affects the following supported versions: 10, 11.1

CVE-2014-0467.title: Mutt Mailreader 'mutt_copy_hdr()' Function Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0467.body: Mutt mailreader is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploitation of this issue allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application, failed attempts lead to denial-of-service. Mutt prior to 1.5.23 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0469.title: XBuffy CVE-2014-0469 Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0469.body: XBuffy is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploitation of this issue allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application, failed attempts lead to denial-of-service.

CVE-2014-0471.title: dpkg CVE-2014-0471 Local Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0471.body: dpkg is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting this issue will allow local attackers to modify files outside the destination directory and possibly gain access to the system.

CVE-2014-0475.title: GNU glibc Locale Environment Handling Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0475.body: GNU glibc is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can use specially crafted requests with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to read arbitrary files in the context of the application. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2014-0479.title: Debian reportbug Package CVE-2014-0479 Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0479.body: reportbug is prone to a remote command-execution vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary commands with the privileges of the user running the affected application.

CVE-2014-0480.title: Django 'return()' Function URI Redirection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0480.body: Django is prone to a URI-redirection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. A successful exploit may aid in phishing attacks; other attacks are possible. Versions prior to Django 1.4.14, 1.5.9, 1.6.6 and 1.7 rc3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0486.title: Knot DNS CVE-2014-0486 Unspecified Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0486.body: Knot DNS is prone to an unspecified denial-of-service vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions for legitimate users.

CVE-2014-0591.title: ISC BIND NSEC3 Signed Zones Queries Handling Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0591.body: ISC BIND is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2014-0592.title: SUSE Cloud Security Group Handling Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0592.body: SUSE Cloud is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.

CVE-2014-0615.title: Juniper Junos CVE-2014-0615 Multiple Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-0615.body: Juniper Junos is prone to multiple local privilege-escalation vulnerabilities. Local attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary commands with root privileges.

CVE-2014-0622.title: EMC Documentum Foundation Services Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0622.body: EMC Documentum Foundation Services is prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to gain unauthorized access to obtain potentially sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks. EMC Documentum Foundation Services 6.5, 6.6, 6.7, 7.0 and 7.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0639.title: EMC RSA Archer GRC CVE-2014-0639 Multiple Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-0639.body: EMC RSA Archer GRC is prone to multiple unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. This issue is fixed in version RSA Archer GRC 5.4 SP1 P3.

CVE-2014-0640.title: RSA Archer GRC CVE-2014-0640 Unspecified Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0640.body: RSA Archer GRC is prone to an unspecified information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. Versions prior to RSA Archer GRC 5.5 SP1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0641.title: RSA Archer GRC CVE-2014-0641 Unspecified Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0641.body: RSA Archer GRC is prone to an unspecified cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to perform certain actions in the context of an authorized user's session and gain unauthorized access to the affected application; other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to RSA Archer GRC 5.5 SP1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0648.title: Cisco Secure Access Control System RMI Interface Unauthenticated Access Security Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0648.body: Cisco Secure Access Control System is prone to a security vulnerability that allows unauthenticated user access. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain unauthorized user access to an affected application. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of an affected device. This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCud75187.

CVE-2014-0649.title: Cisco Secure Access Control System RMI Interface Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0649.body: Cisco Secure Access Control System is prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. A remote attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to affected devices with root-level privileges. This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCud75180.

CVE-2014-0650.title: Cisco Secure Access Control System CVE-2014-0650 Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0650.body: Cisco Secure Access Control System is prone to a remote command-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary OS commands in context of the affected application. This issue is being tracked by Cisco bug ID CSCue65962. Cisco Secure Access Control System 5.0 through versions 5.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0651.title: Cisco Context Directory Agent Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0651.body: Cisco Context Directory Agent is prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. An authenticated attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to services with escalated privileges. This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuj45347.

CVE-2014-0652.body: Cisco Context Directory Agent is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize certain user-supplied input. CVE-2014-0874.title: IBM Content Navigator CVE-2014-0874 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0874.body: IBM Content Navigator is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. IBM Content Navigator 2.0.0, 2.0.1, and 2.0.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0878.title: IBM Java SDK CVE-2014-0878 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0878.body: IBM Java SDK is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass security restriction and perform unauthorized actions in the context of the application.

CVE-2014-0901.title: IBM WebSphere Portal CVE-2014-0901 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0901.body: IBM WebSphere Portal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. IBM WebSphere Portal prior to 8.0.0.1 CF11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-0909.title: IBM RLKS Administration and Reporting Tool CVE-2014-0909 Information Disclosure Vulnerability

This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. CVE-2014-0978.title: Graphviz 'yyerror()' Function Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-0978.body: Graphviz is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the software fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Successful exploits allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Graphviz 2.34.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-0980.body: Publish-it is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Mediatrix 4402 running firmware Dgw 1.1.13.186 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-1618.title: UAEPD Shopping Cart Script Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-1618.body: UAEPD Shopping Cart Script is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. An attacker can exploit these issues by manipulating the SQL query logic to carry out unauthorized actions on the underlying database.

CVE-2014-1620.title: Hiox Guest Book 'add.php' Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-1620.body: Hiox Guest Book is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Hiox Guest Book 5.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-1626.title: Perl 'MARC::File::XML' Module XML External Entity Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1626.body: The MARC::File::XML module of Perl is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information; this may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2014-1635.title: Belkin N750 DB Wi-Fi Gigabit Router CVE-2014-1635 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1635.body: Belkin N750 DB Wi-Fi Gigabit Router is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently bounds check user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in context of the affected device or cause denial-of-service conditions in the context of the affected system.

CVE-2014-1636.title: Command School Student Management System Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-1636.body: Command School Student Management System is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities 2. A cross-site request forgery vulnerability 3. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 4. An HTML injection vulnerability 5. A security-bypass vulnerability Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to run malicious HTML and script codes, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database, or bypass certain security restrictions to perform unauthorized actions. Command School Student Management System 1.06.01 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-1642.title: Xen Use After Free Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1642.body: Xen is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. Local attackers with access to a guest operating system can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges on affected computers or cause denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-1643.title: Symantec Encryption Management Platform Web Email Protection Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1643.body: Symantec Encryption Management Server is prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to gain unauthorized access to obtain potentially sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks. Versions priror to Symantec Encryption Management Server 3.3.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1648.title: Symantec Messaging Gateway Management Console Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1648.body: Symantec Messaging Gateway is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, hijack the browser session, and launch other attacks. Symantec Messaging Gateway 10.0.0 through versions prior to 10.5.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1650.title: Symantec Web Gateway CVE-2014-1650 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1650.body: Symantec Web Gateway is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Versions prior to Symantec Web Gateway 5.2.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1651.title: Symantec Web Gateway CVE-2014-1651 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1651.body: Symantec Web Gateway is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. CVE-2014-1652.title: Symantec Web Gateway CVE-2014-1652 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-1652.body: Symantec Web Gateway is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2014-1664.title: GoToMeeting for Android Multiple Local Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-1664.body: GoToMeeting for Android is prone to multiple local information-disclosure vulnerabilities. Local attackers can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information, which may aid in further attacks. GoToMeeting 5.0.799.1238 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-1665.title: ownCloud CVE-2014-1665 Multiple Cross Site Request Forgery and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-1665.body: ownCloud is prone to multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities and an HTML-injection vulnerability. Exploiting these issues may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions, execute arbitrary script or HTML code within the context of the browser, and steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Other attacks are also possible. ownCloud 6.0.0a is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-1666.title: Xen 'PHYSDEVOP_{prepare,release}_msix' Operations Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1666.body: Xen is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers with access to a guest operating system can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges on affected computers or cause denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-1670.title: Microsoft Bing for Android Unspecified Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1670.body: Microsoft Bing for Android is prone to an unspecified arbitrary code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Successful exploits will compromise the application and possibly the underlying device. Versions prior to Microsoft Bing 4.2.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1671.title: Dell Kace 1000 Systems Management Appliance DS-2014-001 Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-1671.body: Dell Kace 1000 Systems Management Appliance is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Dell Kace 1000 Systems Management Appliance 5.4.76847 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-1686.title: Mediawiki CVE-2014-1686 Full Path Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1686.body: Mediawiki is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. Versions prior to Mediawiki 1.18.0 is vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1692.title: OpenSSH 'schnorr.c' Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1692.body: OpenSSH is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in context of the application. Failed exploits may result in denial-of-service conditions. OpenSSH 6.4 and prior with J-PAKE implemented are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1698.title: SIEMENS SIMATIC WinCC Open Architecture Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1698.body: SIEMENS SIMATIC WinCC Open Architecture is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to disclose sensitive information that may aid in further attacks SIEMENS SIMATIC WinCC OA prior to 3.12 P002 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1699.title: SIEMENS SIMATIC WinCC Open Architecture Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-1699.body: SIEMENS SIMATIC WinCC Open Architecture is prone to denial-of-service vulnerability. Remote attackers may exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions, denying service to legitimate users. SIEMENS SIMATIC WinCC OA prior to 3.12 P002 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1715.body: Google Chrome is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks. Versions prior Chrome 33.0.1750.152 for Mac and Linux and 33.0.1750.154 for Windows are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1731.title: WebKit CVE-2014-1731 Unspecified Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1731.body: WebKit is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue by enticing victims into viewing a malicious webpage. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Note: This issue was previously covered in BID 67082 (Google Chrome Multiple Security Vulnerabilities), but has been given its own record for better documentation.

CVE-2014-1738.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2014-1738 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1738.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers may exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges or cause a kernel crash.

CVE-2014-1739.title: Linux Kernel '/drivers/media/media-device.c' Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1739.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to cause a memory leak to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. Linux kernel 2.6.38 through 3.15-rc2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1740.title: Google Chrome CVE-2014-1740 Use After Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1740.body: Google Chrome is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to Chrome 34.0.1847.137 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1741.title: Google Chrome CVE-2014-1741 Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1741.body: Google Chrome is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability. CVE-2014-1742.body: Google Chrome is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.
