CVE-2014-1837.title: Joomla! Komento Unspecified Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1837.body: Joomla! Komento is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Komento 1.7.3 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1854.title: WordPress AdRotate Plugin 'clicktracker.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1854.body: AdRotate plugin for WordPress is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. AdRotate 3.9.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-1858.title: NumPy '__init__.py' Insecure Temporary File Creation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1858.body: NumPy is prone to a vulnerability because it creates temporary files in an insecure manner. An attacker with local access could potentially exploit this issue to perform symbolic-link attacks, overwriting arbitrary files in the context of the affected application. Successfully mounting a symlink attack may allow the attacker to delete or corrupt sensitive files, which may result in obtaining sensitive information. Other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2014-1867.title: suPHP 'source-highlighting' Feature Local Restriction-Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1867.body: suPHP is prone to a local restriction-bypass vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the affected application. suPHP 0.7.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-1869.title: ZeroClipboard 'ZeroClipboard.swf' Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-1869.body: ZeroClipboard is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to ZeroClipboard 1.3.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1874.title: Linux Kernel 'security_context_to_sid_core()' Function Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1874.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-1877.title: Dokeos Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-1877.body: Dokeos is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Dokeos 2.1.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-1878.title: Icinga 'cgi/cmd.c' Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1878.body: Icinga is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. Icinga prior to 1.10.3, 1.9.5 and 1.8.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1879.title: phpMyAdmin 'import.php' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1879.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. phpMyAdmin versions 3.3.1 through 4.1.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1888.title: Wordpress Buddypress Plugin 'name' Field HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1888.body: Buddypress plugin for WordPress is prone to a HTML injection vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. WordPress Buddypress 1.9.1 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1889.title: WordPress Buddypress Plugin CVE-2014-1889 Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1889.body: WordPress Buddypress Plugin is prone to a privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges within the context of the affected user. Buddypress 1.9.1 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1899.title: Citrix NetScaler Gateway CVE-2014-1899 Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1899.body: Citrix NetScaler Gateway is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Citrix NetScaler Gateway 10.x prior 10.1.123.9 and 9.x prior 9.3.66.5 are vulnerable. Note: Citrix NetScaler Gateway is formerly known as Citrix Access Gateway Enterprise Edition

CVE-2014-1904.title: Spring Framework 'FormTag.java' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1904.body: Spring Framework (Spring MVC) is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2014-1909.title: Android SDK Platform Tool Signedness Error Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1909.body: Android SDK Platform Tool is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-1912.title: Python 'sock_recvfrom_into()' Function Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1912.body: Python is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. Python 2.7,3.1,3.2,3.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1914.title: Command School Student Management System Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-1914.body: Command School Student Management System is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities 2. A cross-site request forgery vulnerability 3. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 4. An HTML injection vulnerability 5. A security-bypass vulnerability Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to run malicious HTML and script codes, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database, or bypass certain security restrictions to perform unauthorized actions. Command School Student Management System 1.06.01 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-1930.title: Visibility Software Cyber Recruiter Multiple Authentication Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-1930.body: Cyber Recruiter is prone to multiple authentication-bypass vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to bypass the authentication mechanism and obtain sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks. Cyber Recruiter 8.0.00 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-1933.title: Python Imaging Library Package Multiple Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-1933.body: Python Imaging Library package is prone to multiple information disclosure vulnerabilities. An attacker with local access could potentially exploit these issues to gain sensitive information. Other attacks may also be possible. Python Imaging Library 2.2.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-1959.title: GnuTLS CVE-2014-1959 Certificate Validation Security Bypass Weakness
CVE-2014-1959.body: GnuTLS is prone to a security-bypass weakness. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks. GnuTLS 3.1.x and 3.2.x are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1968.title: XooNIps CVE-2014-1968 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1968.body: XooNIps is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to XooNIps 3.48 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1971.title: Silex CVE-2014-1971 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1971.body: Silex is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to Silex 2.0.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1973.title: File Explorer CVE-2014-1973 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1973.body: File Explorer is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can use specially crafted requests with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to create or overwrite arbitrary files in the context of the application. This may aid in further attacks. Versions prior to File Explorer 2.1.0.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1975.title: Unzipper CVE-2014-1975 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1975.body: Unzipper is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can use specially crafted requests with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to create or overwrite arbitrary files in the context of the application. This may aid in further attacks. Unzipper 1.0.1 and earlier are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-1985.title: Redmine 'redirect_back_or_default()' Function Open Redirection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-1985.body: Redmine is prone to an open-redirection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can leverage this issue by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it. When an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site; this may aid in phishing attacks. Other attacks are possible. Redmine priot to 2.5.1 and 2.4.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2005.title: Sophos Enterprise Console  Local Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2005.body: Sophos Enterprise Console is prone to a local authentication-bypass vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Sophos Enterprise Console 5.1, 5.2, 5.2.1 and 5.2.1R2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2008.title: PrestaShop Mpay24 Payment Module Information Disclosure and SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-2008.body: Mpay24 Payment Module is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability and an SQL-injection vulnerability. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database and gain access to sensitive information. Other attacks are also possible. Mpay24 Payment Module 1.5 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2009.title: PrestaShop Mpay24 Payment Module Information Disclosure and SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-2009.body: Mpay24 Payment Module is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability and an SQL-injection vulnerability. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database and gain access to sensitive information. Other attacks are also possible. Mpay24 Payment Module 1.5 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2013.title: MuPDF 'xps_parse_color()' Function Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2013.body: MuPDF is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. MuPDF 1.3 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2015.title: FreeRADIUS 'rlm_pap' Module Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2015.body: FreeRADIUS is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2014-2021.title: vBulletin '/apilog.php' Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-2021.body: vBulletin is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML or script code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. vBulletin 5.0.5, 4.2.2, 4.2.1 and 4.2.0 PL2 are vulnerable. Other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-2022.title: vBulletin 'breadcrumbs_create.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2022.body: vBulletin is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. vBulletin 4.2.2 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2023.title: Tapatalk for vBulletin CVE-2014-2023 Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-2023.body: Tapatalk for vBulletin is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Tapatalk for vBulletin 4.9.0 and 5.2.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2032.title: MaraDNS CVE-2014-2032 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2032.body: MaraDNS is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application, denying service to legitimate users. MaraDNS versions prior to 1.4.14 and 2.0.09 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2039.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2014-2039 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2039.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2014-2044.title: ownCloud 'filename' Parameter Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2044.body: ownCloud is prone to remote code execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application.

CVE-2014-2050.title: ownCloud CVE-2014-2050 Cross-Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2050.body: ownCloud is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions such as resetting the user password in the context of the application. ownCloud prior to 6.0.2 and 5.0.15 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2069.title: eshtery CMS 'FileManager.aspx' Local File Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2069.body: eshtery CMS is prone to a local file-disclosure vulnerability because it fails to adequately validate user-supplied input. Exploiting this vulnerability would allow an attacker to obtain potentially sensitive information from local files on computers running the vulnerable application. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2014-2079.title: X File Explorer 'FilePanel::onCmdNewFile' Function Access Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2079.body: X File Explorer is prone to an access-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2014-2080.title: MODx 'header.tpl' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2080.body: MODx is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to MODx 2.2.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2114.title: Cisco Emergency Responder CVE-2014-2114 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2114.body: Cisco Emergency Responder is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCun24384.

CVE-2014-2115.body: Cisco Emergency Responder is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting the issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCun24250.

CVE-2014-2116.title: Cisco Emergency Responder CVE-2014-2116 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-2116.body: Cisco Emergency Responder is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. These issues are being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCun37882.

CVE-2014-2117.title: Cisco Emergency Responder CVE-2014-2117 Open Redirection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2117.body: Cisco Emergency Responder is prone to an open-redirection vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it. When an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site; this may aid in phishing attacks. Other attacks are possible. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCun37909.

CVE-2014-2118.title: Cisco Prime Security Manager CVE-2014-2118 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2118.body: Cisco Prime Security Manager is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCun50687.

CVE-2014-2120.title: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance CVE-2014-2120 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2120.body: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCun19025.

CVE-2014-2121.title: Cisco Hosted Collaboration Solution CVE-2014-2121 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2121.body: Cisco Hosted Collaboration Solution is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID's CSCug77633, CSCug77667, CSCug78266, CSCug82795 and CSCuh58643.

CVE-2014-2122.title: Cisco Hosted Collaboration Solution CVE-2014-2122 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2122.body: Cisco Hosted Collaboration Solution is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the application to hang intermittently, which leads to denial-of-service conditions. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCub58999.

CVE-2014-2124.title: Catalyst 6500 Series Switches 6500 CVE-2014-2124 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2124.body: Catalyst 6500 Series Switches are prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected device, denying service to legitimate users. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuf60783.

CVE-2014-2147.title: Cisco Prime Infrastructure CVE-2014-2147 Cross Frame Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2147.body: Cisco Prime Infrastructure is prone to a cross-frame scripting vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to bypass the same-origin policy and perform unauthorized actions; other attacks are possible. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuj42444.

CVE-2014-2151.title: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance WebVPN Portal Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2151.body: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability due to the improper validation of user-supplied input in the WebVPN portal. An attacker can leverage this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCui04520.

CVE-2014-2152.title: Cisco Prime Infrastructure CVE-2014-2152 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2152.body: Cisco Prime Infrastructure is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCun21868.

CVE-2014-2153.title: Cisco Prime Infrastructure CVE-2014-2153 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-2153.body: Cisco Prime Infrastructure is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. These issues are being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCun21869.

CVE-2014-2176.title: Cisco IOS XR Software IPv6 Packet Handling CVE-2014-2176 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2176.body: Cisco IOS XR is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause NP chip and a line card on an affected device to lockup and reload, denying service to legitimate users. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCun71928.

CVE-2014-2197.title: Cisco Unified Communications Domain Manager CVE-2014-2197 Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2197.body: Cisco Unified Communications Domain Manager is prone to a privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to escalate privileges and gain administrative access on an affected computer. Cisco Unified Communications Domain Manager 8.1.1, 8.1.2 and 8.1.3 is vulnerable. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCun49862.

CVE-2014-2210.title: CA Erwin Web Portal CVE-2014-2210 Multiple Directory Traversal Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-2210.body: CA Erwin Web Portal is prone to multiple directory-traversal vulnerabilities. A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access or read arbitrary files that contain sensitive information, gain escalated privileges, execute arbitrary code or cause a denial-of-service vulnerability. CA Erwin Web Portal 9.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-2235.title: Askbot Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-2235.body: Askbot is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Askbot prior to 0.7.49 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2236.title: Askbot Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-2236.body: Askbot is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Askbot prior to 0.7.49 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2238.title: MantisBT 'adm_config_report.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2238.body: MantisBT is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2014-2240.title: FreeType 'src/cff/cf2hints.c' Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2240.body: FreeType is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to FreeType 2.5.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2242.title: MediaWiki CVE-2014-2242 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2242.body: MediaWiki is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 65883 (MediaWiki Multiple Security Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it. Versions prior to MediaWiki 1.22.3, 1.21.6 and 1.19.12 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2244.title: MediaWiki 'text' Prameter HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2244.body: MediaWiki is prone to a HTML injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 65883 (MediaWiki Multiple Security Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it. Versions prior to MediaWiki 1.22.3, 1.21.6 and 1.19.12 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2246.title: Siemens SIMATIC S7-1500 CVE-2014-2246 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2246.body: Siemens SIMATIC S7-1500 is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to SIMATIC S7-1500 1.5.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2260.title: Ajenti 'Command' Field HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2260.body: Ajenti is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2014-2263.title: FFmpeg and Libav 'libavformat/mpegtsenc.c' Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2263.body: FFmpeg and Libav are prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability due to a out-of-bounds write memory access condition. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-2271.title: Kingsoft Office CVE-2014-2271 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2271.body: Kingsoft Office is prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers execute arbitrary code. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks and execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Kingsoft Office 5.3.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-2273.title: Huawei P2 CVE-2014-2273 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2273.body: Huawei P2 is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain root privileges. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2014-2276.title: EMC Connectrix Manager Converged Network Edition Remote Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2276.body: EMC Connectrix Manager Converged Network Edition is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. EMC Connectrix Manager Converged Network Edition 12.1.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-2279.title: SeedDMS 'out.LogManagement.php' Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2279.body: SeedDMS is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit the vulnerability using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access arbitrary files that contain sensitive information. Information harvested may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to SeedDMS 4.3.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2299.title: Wireshark MPEG File Parser 'wiretap/mpeg.c' Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2299.body: Wireshark is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability . An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application. Given the nature of this issue, attackers may also be able to execute arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed. Wireshark 1.10.0 to 1.10.5 and 1.8.0 to 1.8.12 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2309.title: Linux Kernel 'ip6_route_add()' Function Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2309.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to consume large amounts of memory resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Linux kernel 3.0 through 3.13.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2315.title: WordPress Thank You Counter Button Plugin Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-2315.body: Thank You Counter Button plugin for WordPress is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Thank You Counter Button 1.8.7 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-2318.body: Netvolution is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Netvolution 3.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-2711.title: Juniper Junos J-Web CVE-2014-2711 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2711.body: Juniper Junos is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2014-2712.title: Juniper Junos J-Web CVE-2014-2712 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-2712.body: Juniper Junos is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Juniper Junos 11.4, 12.1, 12.1X44, and 12.1X45 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2714.title: Juniper Junos SRX Series Enhanced Web Filtering CVE-2014-2714 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2714.body: Juniper Junos is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2014-2732.title: Siemens SINEMA Server CVE-2014-2732 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2732.body: Siemens SINEMA server is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Exploiting this issue can allow an attacker to gain access to arbitrary files. Information harvested may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to SINEMA server V12 SP1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2734.title: Ruby OpenSSL CVE-2014-2734 CA Private Key Spoofing Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2734.body: Ruby OpenSSL is prone to a spoofing vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to spoof CA private key, which will aid in further attacks.

CVE-2014-2739.title: Linux Kernel 'cma_req_handler()' Function Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2739.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the kernel to crash, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-2749.body: SAP HANA is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2014-2842.title: Juniper Networks ScreenOS SSL/TLS Protocol Packet Handling Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2842.body: ScreenOS is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow the attacker to cause denial-of-service conditions. ScreenOS 6.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-2851.title: Linux Kernel 'ping_init_sock()' Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2851.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers may exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges or cause a kernel crash.

CVE-2014-2853.title: MediaWiki 'InfoAction.php' HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2853.body: MediaWiki is prone to a HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. MediaWiki prior 1.21.9 and 1.22.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-2856.title: CUPS Web Interface Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-2856.body: CUPS is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. CUPS 1.6.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-2879.title: Dell SonicWall EMail Security Appliance Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-2879.body: The Dell SonicWall EMail Security Appliance is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Dell SonicWall EMail Security Appliance 7.4.5 and prior versions are vulnerable.

Versions prior to JBoss KeyCloak 1.0.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3710.title: PHP 'donote()' Function Out-of-Bounds Read Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3710.body: PHP is prone to an out-of-bounds read vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application denying service to legitimate users or disclose sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. PHP version 5.4.34 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-3712.title: Katello CVE-2014-3712 Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-3712.body: Katello is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerabilities due to a NULL pointer dereference error. An attacker may exploit these issues to crash the affected service, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-3730.title: Django 'is_safe_url()' Function URI Redirection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3730.body: Django is prone to a URI-redirection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. A successful exploit may aid in phishing attacks; other attacks are possible. Versions prior to Django 1.4.13, 1.5.8, 1.6.5 and 1.7 beta 4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3744.title: St Module Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3744.body: St Module is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting this issue will allow an attacker to view arbitrary files within the context of the web server. Information harvested may aid in launching further attacks. Version prior to St 0.2.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3775.title: libgadu CVE-2014-3775 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3775.body: libgadu is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. libgadu 1.11.3 and prior are vulnerable

CVE-2014-3776.title: CHICKEN 'read-u8vector!' Procedure Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3776.body: CHICKEN is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to CHICKEN 4.8.0.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3780.title: Citrix VDI-In-A-Box CVE-2014-3780 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3780.body: Citrix VDI-In-A-Box is prone to a authentication-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to bypass authentication and gain access to VDI instances, which will aid in further attacks. Citrix VDI-In-A-Box prior to 5.3.7 and 5.4.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3789.title: Cogent Real-Time Systems DataHub 'GetPermissions.asp' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3789.body: Cogent Real-Time Systems DataHub is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Versions prior to Cogent DataHub 7.3.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3790.title: VMWare vCenter Server Appliance Ruby vSphere Console Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3790.body: VMWare vCenter Server Appliance is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gains escalated privileges and execute arbitrary commands with root privileges. Successfully exploiting this issue will result in the complete compromise of affected computers. vCenter Server Appliance 5.1 and 5.5 are vulnerabile.

CVE-2014-3798.title: Citrix XenServer Windows Guest Tools Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3798.body: Citrix XenServer is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the Windows guest operating system to crash resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-3801.title: OpenStack Heat Template URL Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3801.body: OpenStack Heat is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks. OpenStack Heat versions 2013.2 through 2013.2.3, and 2014.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3815.title: Juniper Junos CVE-2014-3815 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3815.body: Juniper Junos is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause an affected device to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2014-3817.title: Juniper Junos NAT Functionality CVE-2014-3817 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3817.body: Juniper Junos is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause an affected device to crash, denying service to legitimate users. Note: This issue affects on SRX series devices.

CVE-2014-3819.title: Juniper Junos CVE-2014-3819 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3819.body: Juniper Junos is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow remote attackers to crash and restart the RPD (Routing Protocol Daemon), causing denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-3821.title: Juniper Junos SRX Web Authentication Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3821.body: Juniper Junos is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2014-3828.title: Centreon and Centreon Enterprise Server CVE-2014-3828 Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-3828.body: Centreon and Centreon Enterprise Server are prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. The following products are vulnerable: Centreon 2.5.1 and prior versions Centreon Enterprise Server 2.2 and prior versions

CVE-2014-3840.title: Mayan EDMS Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-3840.body: Mayan EDMS is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker supplied HTML and script code could be executed in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. Mayan EDMS 0.13 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-3859.title: RETIRED: ISC BIND EDNS Options CVE-2014-3859 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3859.body: ISC BIND is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition, denying service to legitimate users. ISC BIND 9.10.0 and 9.10.0-P1 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected. Note: This BID is being retired as a duplicate of the issue discussed in BID 68038 (ISC BIND CVE-2014-3859 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability).

CVE-2014-3864.title: dpkg Source Package Header Line Processing Local Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3864.body: dpkg is prone to a local directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting this issue will allow local attackers to modify files outside the destination directory and possibly gain access to the system. dpkg 1.3.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-3865.title: dpkg Source Package Index: pseudo-header Processing Multiple Local Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3865.body: dpkg is prone to multiple directory-traversal vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting these issues will allow local attackers to modify files outside the destination directory and possibly gain access to the system. dpkg 1.3.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-3867.body: IBM Sametime Meeting Server is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this gain access to sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. IBM Sametime Meeting Server 8.5.2, 8.5.2.1, 9.0 and 9.0.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3868.title: ZeusCart 'prodid' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3868.body: ZeusCart is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. ZeusCart 4.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-3873.body: FreeBSD ktrace utility is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to obtain sensitive information like reading the kernel memory that may aid in further attacks. FreeBSD 8.4, 9.1 and 9.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3878.title: IPSwitch IMail Server WEB client Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-3878.body: IPSwitch IMail Server WEB client is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2014-3879.body: The OpenPAM module for FreeBSD is prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access to the affected computer without a password or with an incorrect password. This can result in complete compromise of the underlying system. The effect of an exploit of this vulnerability depends on the application through which it occurs. FreeBSD 9.2 and later are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3892.title: Meridian CVE-2014-3892 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-3892.body: Meridian is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2014-3922.body: Trend Micro InterScan Messaging Security Virtual Appliance is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. CVE-2014-3924.body: Webmin is prone to multiple unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Webmin prior to 1.690 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3924.body: Webmin Usermin is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to Webmin 1.600 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3933.body: The Addressfield Tokens module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. MediaWiki prior to 1.22.7, 1.21.10 and 1.19.16 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3969.body: Xen is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers with access to a guest operating system can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges on affected computers. Xen 4.4 and later versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3980.body: libfep is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to inject commands into other user sessions. libfep 0.0.5 through 0.0.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-3994.body: Djblets is prone to HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2014-3999.body: Horde_Ldap is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks. Horde_Ldap versions prior to 2.6.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4002.title: Cacti CVE-2014-4002 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4002.body: Cacti is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2014-4049.body: PHP is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. CVE-2014-4083.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer CVE-2014-4083 Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4083.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a specially crafted webpage. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. Internet Explorer 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 and 11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4113.title: Microsoft Windows Kernel 'Win32k.sys' CVE-2014-4113 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4113.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges and gain access to kernel memory.

CVE-2014-4114.title: Microsoft Windows CVE-2014-4114 OLE Package Manager Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4114.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. An attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-4115.title: Microsoft Windows FAT32 Disk Partition Driver CVE-2014-4115 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4115.body: Microsoft Windows FAT32 Disk Partition Driver is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers.

CVE-2014-4117.title: Microsoft Office Word File Processing CVE-2014-4117 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4117.body: Microsoft Office is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability because it fails to properly handle objects in memory. An attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-4121.title: Microsoft .NET Framework 'iriParsing' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4121.body: Microsoft .NET Framework is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-4122.title: Microsoft .NET Framework CVE-2014-4122 ASLR Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4122.body: Microsoft .NET Framework is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and execute arbitrary code by exploiting another vulnerability in the application.

CVE-2014-4123.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer CVE-2014-4123 Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4123.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges. Successful exploits may aid in further attacks. Internet Explorer 7, 8, 9, 10, and 11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4140.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and execute arbitrary code by exploiting another vulnerability in the application.

CVE-2014-4148.title: Microsoft Windows 'Win32k.sys' TrueType Font Handling Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4148.body: Microsoft Windows kernel is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue by tricking an unsuspecting victim into opening a specially malformed TrueType font. Successful exploits can allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-4165.title: ntopng '/plugins/rrdPlugin' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4165.body: ntopng is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2014-4170.title: ArticleFR 'data.php' CVE-2014-4170 Access Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4170.body: ArticleFR is prone to an access-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. ArticleFR 11.06.2014 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-4200.title: VMware Support CVE-2014-4200 Insecure File Permissions Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4200.body: VMware Support is prone to an insecure-file-permissions vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information. This may aid in other attacks. VMware Support 0.88 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-4301.title: Ajenti Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-4301.body: Ajenti is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. Attacker-supplied JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. Ajenti 1.2.21.6 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-4303.title: Drupal Touch Theme Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4303.body: Touch Theme for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Touch 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4312.title: Epicor Enterprise CVE-2014-4312 Multiple Cross Site Scripting and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-4312.body: Epicor Enterprise is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities and multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Epicor Enterprise 7.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-4313.title: Epicor Procurement  CVE-2014-4313 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4313.body: Epicor Procurement is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. A successful exploit could allow an attacker to compromise the application, to access or modify data, or to exploit vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2014-4329.title: ntopng 'lua/host_details.lua' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4329.body: ntopng is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. ntopng 1.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-4330.title: Perl CVE-2014-4330 Stack Overflow Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4330.body: Perl is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to cause a denial-of-service conditions. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code-execution may be possible; however this has not been confirmed. Perl versions 5.20.1 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4341.title: MIT Kerberos 5 CVE-2014-4341 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4341.body: MIT Kerberos 5 is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a program to crash, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to Kerberos 1.12.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4342.title: MIT Kerberos 5 GSSAPI Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4342.body: MIT Kerberos 5 is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability due to a NULL pointer dereference error. An attacker may exploit this issue to crash the affected service, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Kerberos 5 versions 1.7.0 through 1.12.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4344.title: MIT Kerberos 5 CVE-2014-4344 NULL Pointer Dereference Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4344.body: MIT Kerberos 5 is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a program to crash, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to Kerberos 5 1.12.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4345.title: MIT kerberos 5 'ldap_principal2.c' Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4345.body: MIT kerberos 5 is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability due to a out-of-bounds write memory access condition. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. MIT kerberos 5 1.6 through 1.12.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4346.title: Citrix NetScaler Application Delivery Controller and Gateway Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4346.body: Citrix NetScaler Application Delivery Controller and NetScaler Gateway are prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Citrix NetScaler Application Delivery Controller 10.x prior 10.1-126.12 and 9.x prior 9.3-62.4 are vulnerable. Note: Citrix NetScaler Gateway is formerly known as Citrix Access Gateway Enterprise Edition

CVE-2014-4347.title: Citrix NetScaler Application Delivery Controller Cookie Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4347.body: Citrix NetScaler Application Delivery Controller is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information; this may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2014-4348.title: phpMyAdmin CVE-2014-4348 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-4348.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. phpMyAdmin 4.2.x through 4.2.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4349.title: phpMyAdmin CVE-2014-4349 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-4349.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. phpMyAdmin 4.1.x through 4.1.14 and 4.2.x through 4.2.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4350.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4350 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4350.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate bounds checks on user-supplied input. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user; failed exploit attempts will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-4351.title: Apple Mac OS X QuickTime CVE-2014-4351 'm4a' File Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4351.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user; failed exploit attempts will cause denial-of-service conditions. Apple Mac OS X versions prior to 10.10 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4352.title: Apple iOS CVE-2014-4352 Local Information Disclosure Security Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4352.body: Apple iOS is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks. NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 69882 (Apple iOS Prior to iOS 8 and TV Prior to TV 7 Multiple Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2014-4352.title: RETIRED: Apple iOS Prior to iOS 8 and TV Prior to TV 7 Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-4352.body: Apple iOS and TV are prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. These issues affect the following components: 802.1X, Accounts, Accessibility, Accounts Framework, Address Book, App Installation, Assets, Bluetooth, CoreGraphics, Foundation, Home & Lock Screen, iMessage, IOAcceleratorFamily, IOAcceleratorFamily, IOHIDFamily, IOHIDFamily, IOKit, Kernel, Libnotify, Mail, Profiles, Safari, Sandbox Profiles, syslog and WebKit components. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow attackers to crash the affected device, bypass security restrictions, obtain sensitive information, or execute arbitrary code. Other attacks are also possible. This BID is being retired. CVE-2014-4367.title: Apple iOS CVE-2014-4367 Security Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4367.body: Apple iOS is prone to a security vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue bypass security restrictions, and perform other attacks. NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 69882 (Apple iOS Prior to iOS 8 and TV Prior to TV 7 Multiple Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2014-4367.title: RETIRED: Apple iOS Prior to iOS 8 and TV Prior to TV 7 Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-4367.body: Apple iOS and TV are prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. These issues affect the following components: 802.1X, Accounts, Accessibility, Accounts Framework, Address Book, App Installation, Assets, Bluetooth, CoreGraphics, Foundation, Home & Lock Screen, iMessage, IOAcceleratorFamily, IOAcceleratorFamily, IOHIDFamily, IOHIDFamily, IOKit, Kernel, Libnotify, Mail, Profiles, Safari, Sandbox Profiles, syslog and WebKit components. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow attackers to crash the affected device, bypass security restrictions, obtain sensitive information, or execute arbitrary code. Other attacks are also possible. This BID is being retired. CVE-2014-4368.title: Apple iOS Lock Screen CVE-2014-4368 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4368.body: Apple iOS is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker with physical access to a locked device can leverage this issue to bypass the lock screen and gain unauthorized access to the device. NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 69882 (Apple iOS Prior to iOS 8 and TV Prior to TV 7 Multiple Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2014-4377.title: Multiple Apple Products CVE-2014-4377 PDF Handling Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4377.body: Apple TV, Mac OS X, and iOS are prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 69882 (Apple iOS Prior to iOS 8 and TV Prior to TV 7 Multiple Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2014-4378.title: Apple TV/Mac OS X/iOS CVE-2014-4378 Out of Bounds Read Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4378.body: Apple TV, Mac OS X, and iOS are prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions or gain access to sensitive information. other attacks are also possible. NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 69882 (Apple iOS Prior to iOS 8 and TV Prior to TV 7 Multiple Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it. This issue is fixed in: Apple Mac Os X 10.9.5 Apple iOS 8 Apple TV 7

CVE-2014-4380.title: Apple TV and iOS CVE-2014-4380 Out of Bounds Write Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4380.body: Apple TV and iOS are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 69882 (Apple iOS Prior to iOS 8 and TV Prior to TV 7 Multiple Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it. This issue is fixed in: Apple iOS 8 Apple TV 7

CVE-2014-4381.title: Apple TV/Mac OS X/iOS CVE-2014-4381 Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4381.body: Apple TV, Mac OS X, and iOS are prone to an arbitrary code-execution vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied input. An attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code with system privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 69882 (Apple iOS Prior to iOS 8 and TV Prior to TV 7 Multiple Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2014-4390.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4390 Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4390.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to an arbitrary code-execution vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the system privileges. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-4391.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4391 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4391.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2014-4393.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4393 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4393.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate bounds checks on user-supplied input. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user; failed exploit attempts will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-4406.title: Apple Mac OS X Server CVE-2014-4406 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4406.body: Apple Mac OS X Server is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. This issue is fixed in Mac OS X Server version 3.2.1.

CVE-2014-4407.title: Apple iOS and TV CVE-2014-4407 Information Disclosure Security Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4407.body: Apple iOS and TV are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks. NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 69882 (Apple iOS Prior to iOS 8 and TV Prior to TV 7 Multiple Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2014-4407.title: RETIRED: Apple iOS Prior to iOS 8 and TV Prior to TV 7 Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-4407.body: Apple iOS and TV are prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. These issues affect the following components: 802.1X, Accounts, Accessibility, Accounts Framework, Address Book, App Installation, Assets, Bluetooth, CoreGraphics, Foundation, Home & Lock Screen, iMessage, IOAcceleratorFamily, IOAcceleratorFamily, IOHIDFamily, IOHIDFamily, IOKit, Kernel, Libnotify, Mail, Profiles, Safari, Sandbox Profiles, syslog and WebKit components. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow attackers to crash the affected device, bypass security restrictions, obtain sensitive information, or execute arbitrary code. Other attacks are also possible. This BID is being retired. CVE-2014-4408.title: Apple iOS and TV CVE-2014-4408 Out of Bounds Read Local Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4408.body: Apple iOS and TV are prone to a local memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information or execute arbitrary code within the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions. NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 69882 (Apple iOS Prior to iOS 8 and TV Prior to TV 7 Multiple Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it. This issue is fixed in: Apple iOS 8 Apple TV 7

CVE-2014-4409.title: WebKit Private Browsing CVE-2014-4409 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4409.body: WebKit is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. This issue occurs when private browsing mode is enabled. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions.

CVE-2014-4410.title: WebKit CVE-2014-4410 Unspecified Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4410.body: WebKit is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue by enticing victims into viewing a malicious webpage. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected browser or cause denial-of-service conditions; other attacks may also be possible. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 69881 (WebKit Multiple Unspecified Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected browser or cause denial-of-service conditions; other attacks may also be possible. This BID is being retired. CVE-2014-4416.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4416 Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4416.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to an arbitrary code-execution vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the system privileges. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-4417.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4417 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4417.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a denial of service condition.

CVE-2014-4418.body: Apple iOS and TV are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code with system privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. CVE-2014-4423.title: Apple iOS CVE-2014-4423 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4423.body: Apple iOS is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. NOTE: This issue was previously discussed in BID 69882 (Apple iOS Prior to iOS 8 and TV Prior to TV 7 Multiple Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2014-4423.title: RETIRED: Apple iOS Prior to iOS 8 and TV Prior to TV 7 Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-4423.body: Apple iOS and TV are prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. These issues affect the following components: 802.1X, Accounts, Accessibility, Accounts Framework, Address Book, App Installation, Assets, Bluetooth, CoreGraphics, Foundation, Home & Lock Screen, iMessage, IOAcceleratorFamily, IOAcceleratorFamily, IOHIDFamily, IOHIDFamily, IOKit, Kernel, Libnotify, Mail, Profiles, Safari, Sandbox Profiles, syslog and WebKit components. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow attackers to crash the affected device, bypass security restrictions, obtain sensitive information, or execute arbitrary code. Other attacks are also possible. This BID is being retired. The following individual records exist to better document the issues: 69913 Apple iOS and TV CVE-2014-4364 Spoofing Vulnerability 69917 Apple iOS CVE-2014-4423 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
