CVE-2014-4424.title: Apple Mac OS X Server CVE-2014-4424 SQL Injection Vulnerabilitiy
CVE-2014-4424.body: Apple Mac OS X Server is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue by manipulating the SQL query logic to carry out unauthorized actions on the underlying database.

CVE-2014-4425.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4425 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4425.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2014-4426.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4426 AFP File Server Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4426.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. A remote attacker can leverage this issue to gain access to the sensitive information.

CVE-2014-4427.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4427 Accessibility API Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4427.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability vulnerability. A remote attacker can leverage this issue to perform unauthorized actions.

CVE-2014-4428.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4428 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4428.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2014-4430.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4430 Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4430.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.

CVE-2014-4431.title: Apple Mac OS X Dock CVE-2014-4431 Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4431.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker with physical access to a computer can exploit this issue to bypass screen lock. Successful exploits may lead to other attacks. Apple Mac OS X versions prior to 10.10 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4432.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4432 'fdesetup' Command Local Security Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4432.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a local security vulnerability. A local attacker can leverage this issue to bypass certain security restrictions or gain access to potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-4433.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4433 HFS Resource Forks Local Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4433.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a local heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. A local attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel level privileges or cause the affected system to shutdown, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2014-4434.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4434 HFS Filename Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4434.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a local denial of service vulnerability. A local attacker can leverage this issue to cause the affected system to shutdown, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2014-4435.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4435 Security Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4435.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a remote security vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue with brute-force techniques to obtain sensitive information that can aid in further attacks. Apple Mac OS X versions prior to 10.10 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4436.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4436 IOHIDFamily Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4436.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a remote denial of service vulnerability. A remote attacker can leverage this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2014-4437.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4437 Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4437.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. A remote attacker can leverage this issue to perform unauthorized actions. Versions prior to Apple Mac OS X 10.10 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4439.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4439 Mail Application Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4439.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to gain access to sensitive information.

CVE-2014-4440.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4440 Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4440.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.

CVE-2014-4442.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4442 System Control Sockets Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4442.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker can leverage this issue to terminate the affected system, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2014-4443.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4443 ASN.1 Data Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4443.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. A remote attacker can leverage this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2014-4448.title: Apple iOS CVE-2014-4448 Encryption Security Weakness
CVE-2014-4448.body: Apple iOS is prone to a security weakness that may allow attackers to obtain sensitive information. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to view encrypted data and obtain sensitive information. This may lead to other attacks.

CVE-2014-4449.title: Apple iOS TLS certificate Validation CVE-2014-4449 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4449.body: Apple iOS is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2014-4451.title: Apple iOS Lock Screen CVE-2014-4451 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4451.body: Apple iOS is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker with physical access to a device can exploit this issue to bypass screen lock. Successful exploits may lead to other attacks. This issue is fixed in iOS 8.1.1

CVE-2014-4452.title: WebKit CVE-2014-4452 Unspecified Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4452.body: WebKit is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue by enticing victims into viewing a malicious webpage. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected browser or cause denial-of-service conditions; other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2014-4453.title: Apple Mac OS X and iOS Multiple Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-4453.body: Apple Mac OS X and iOS are prone to multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities. Attackers can leverage these issues to gain access to sensitive information. Information obtained may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2014-4455.title: Apple iOS and TV CVE-2014-4455 Local Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4455.body: Apple iOS and TV are prone to a local code-execution vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code. This issue is fixed in: Apple iOS 8.1.1 Apple TV 7.0.2

CVE-2014-4457.title: Apple iOS CVE-2014-4457 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4457.body: Apple iOS for the iPhone, the iPod touch, and the iPad is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass intended sandbox restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks. This issue is fixed in iOS 8.1.1

CVE-2014-4458.title: Apple Mac OS X CVE-2014-4458 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4458.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information; this may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2014-4460.title: Apple Mac OS X and iOS Multiple Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-4460.body: Apple Mac OS X and iOS are prone to multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities. Attackers can leverage these issues to gain access to sensitive information. Information obtained may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2014-4461.title: Apple iOS and TV CVE-2014-4461 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4461.body: Apple iOS and TV are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code with system privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. This issue is fixed in: Apple iOS 8.1.1 Apple TV 7.0.2

CVE-2014-4466.body: WebKit is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-4479.title: WebKit CVE-2014-4479 Unspecified Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4479.body: WebKit is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-4496.title: Multiple Apple Products Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-4496.body: Multiple Apple products are prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. The update addresses new vulnerabilities that affect AppleFileConduit, Kernel, and WebKit components. Attackers can exploit these issues to bypass security restrictions, disclose information, and perform other attacks.

CVE-2014-4502.title: Multiple Products 'parse_notify' Function Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-4502.body: SGMiner, CGMiner, BFGMiner and and CPUMiner are prone to multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. Successful exploits allow remote attackers to overwrite memory in the heap in the context of the vulnerable application.This may lead to further attacks. Following products are vulnerable: SGMiner prior to 4.2.2 CGMiner prior 4.3.5 BFGMiner prior 4.1.0 CPUMiner prior 2.4.1

CVE-2014-4505.title: Drupal Easy Breadcrumb Module Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4505.body: Drupal Easy Breadcrumb module is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the vulnerable site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Easy breadcrumbs 7.x-2.x versions prior to 7.x-2.10 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4506.title: Drupal Custom Meta Module Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-4506.body: Drupal Custom Meta module is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the vulnerable site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials. The following versions are vulnerable: Custom Meta 6.x-1.x versions prior to 6.x-1.2. Custom Meta 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.2.

CVE-2014-4508.title: Linux Kernel Unspecified Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4508.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to crash the system, denying service to legitimate users. Linux kernel 3.11 through 3.15 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-4510.title: Debian Apt-Cacher NG CVE-2014-4510 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4510.body: Debian Apt-Cacher NG is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2014-4549.title: WordPress WooCommerce SagePay Direct Payment Gateway Plugin Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4549.body: WooCommerce SagePay Direct Payment plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. WooCommerce SagePay Direct Payment 0.1.6.6 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-4608.title: Linux Kernel LZO Implementation 'lzo1x_decompress_safe.c' Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4608.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible; however, this has not been confirmed. Linux kernel versions prior to 3.10.45 and 3.15.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4615.title: PyCADF Notifier Middleware Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4615.body: PyCADF is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2014-4616.title: Python JSON Module '_json.c' Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4616.body: Python is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information. Information obtained may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2014-4618.title: EMC Documentum Content Server CVE-2014-4618 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4618.body: EMC Documentum Content Server is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-4619.title: EMC RSA Identity Management and Governance NovellIM Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4619.body: EMC RSA Identity Management and Governance is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass authentication mechanism and gain unauthorized access to the system. Successfully exploiting this issue may lead to further attacks. RSA Identity Management and Governance versions 6.5.x and 6.8.x are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4620.title: EMC NetWorker Module for MEDITECH CVE-2014-4620 Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4620.body: EMC NetWorker Module for MEDITECH is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information. Information obtained may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2014-4621.title: EMC Documentum Content Server CVE-2014-4621 Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4621.body: EMC Documentum Content Server is prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to gain super-user privileges and perform unauthorized actions on Content Server. The following products are vulnerable: EMC Documentum Content Server versions prior to 7.1 P08 EMC Documentum Content Server versions prior to 7.0 P15 EMC Documentum Content Server versions prior to 6.7 SP2 P17

CVE-2014-4622.title: EMC Documentum Content Server CVE-2014-4622 Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4622.body: EMC Documentum Content Server is prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to gain super-user privileges and perform unauthorized actions on Content Server. The following products are vulnerable: EMC Documentum Content Server versions prior to 7.1 P08 EMC Documentum Content Server versions prior to 7.0 P15 EMC Documentum Content Server versions prior to 6.7 SP2 P17

CVE-2014-4623.title: EMC Avamar CVE-2014-4623 Password Encryption Weakness
CVE-2014-4623.body: EMC Avamar is prone to a weak password encryption weakness. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to decrypt stored passwords; this may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2014-4624.title: VMware vSphere Data Protection CVE-2014-4624 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4624.body: VMware vSphere Data Protection is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2014-4627.title: RSA Web Threat Detection CVE-2014-4627 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4627.body: RSA Web Threat Detection is prone to an unspecified SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code, to gain elevated privileges and to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. RSA Web Threat Detection 4.x versions prior to 4.6.1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-4629.title: EMC Documentum Content Server CVE-2014-4629 Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4629.body: EMC Documentum Content Server is prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to gain escalated privileges and view or modify sensitive information on the Content Server. The following products are vulnerable: EMC Documentum Content Server versions of 7.1 EMC Documentum Content Server versions of 7.0 EMC Documentum Content Server versions of 6.7 SP2 EMC Documentum Content Server versions prior to 6.7 SP2

CVE-2014-4631.title: RSA Adaptive Authentication (On-Premise) CVE-2014-4631 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4631.body: RSA Adaptive Authentication (On-Premise) is prone to an authentication-bypass Vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass authentication mechanism and gain unauthorized access to the affected application. This may aid in further attacks. The following products and versions are vulnerable: RSA Adaptive Authentication (On-Premise) 6.0.2.1 to 7.1 P3 RSA Adaptive Authentication Integration Adapters 1.x and 2.x

CVE-2014-4647.title: Embarcadero ER/Studio Data Architect ActiveX Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4647.body: Embarcadero ER/Studio Data Architect is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to write files in the context of the current process which leads to arbitrary code execution within the application using the ActiveX control (typically Internet Explorer). Failed attacks will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-4653.title: Linux Kernel 'control.c' File Use After Free Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2014-4653.body: The Linux Kernel is prone to a use-after-free memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in contexts of the application or corrupt the kernel memory. Failed exploit attempts can result in a denial-of-service condition.

TeamSpeak Client 3.0.14 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-7222.title: TeamSpeak Client Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-7222.body: TeamSpeak Client is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition. TeamSpeak Client 3.0.14 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-7224.title: Google Android API WebView Component CVE-2014-7224 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-7224.body: Google Android is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Successful exploits will compromise the application and possibly the underlying device.

CVE-2014-7230.title: OpenStack Cinder/Nova/Trove CVE-2014-7230 Local Password Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-7230.body: OpenStack Cinder, Nova, and Trove are prone to a local password-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to disclose sensitive information. Information obtained may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2014-7231.title: OpenStack Cinder/Nova/Trove CVE-2014-7231 Local Password Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-7231.body: OpenStack Cinder, Nova, and Trove are prone to a local password-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to disclose sensitive information. Information obtained may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2014-7235.title: FreePBX 'index.php' Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-7235.body: FreePBX is prone to a remote command-execution vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize input data. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary commands in the context of the affected application.

CVE-2014-7277.title: Zyxel SBG-3300 Series Routers CVE-2014-7277 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-7277.body: Zyxel SBG-3300 series routers are prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. Zyxel SBG-3300 V1.00(AADY.4)C0 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-7283.title: Linux Kernel 'xfs_da_btree.c' Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-7283.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-7286.title: Symantec Deployment Solution CVE-2014-7286 Memory Overwrite Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-7286.body: Symantec Deployment Solution is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges in the context of the affected application. Deployment Solution 6.9 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-7288.title: Symantec Encryption Management Server CVE-2014-7288 Local Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-7288.body: Symantec Encryption Management Server is prone to a local command-injection vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands with elevated privileges. The following products and versions are vulnerable: Versions prior to Symantec Encryption Management Server 3.3.2 MP6 Versions prior to Symantec PGP Universal Server 3.3.2 MP6

CVE-2014-7295.title: Mediawiki 'OutputPage.php' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-7295.body: Mediawiki is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to Mediawiki 1.19.20, 1.22.12 and 1.23.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-7809.title: Apache Struts CVE-2014-7809 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-7809.body: Apache Struts is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because it fails to adequately handle user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass cross-site request forgery protections and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks. Apache Struts versions 2.0.0 through 2.3.16.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-7816.title: JBoss Undertow CVE-2014-7816 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2014-7816.body: JBoss Undertow is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting this issue can allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that could aid in further attacks. Undertow 1.2.0 Beta1 is vulnerable.

CVE-2014-7817.title: GNU glibc CVE-2014-7817 Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-7817.body: GNU glibc is prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers execute arbitrary commands. Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands in the context of the affected application.

CVE-2014-7822.title: Linux Kernel 'splice()' System Call Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-7822.body: The Linux Kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-7824.title: D-Bus CVE-2014-7824 Incomplete Fix Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-7824.body: D-Bus is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers may exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions, denying service to legitimate users. Note: This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for the issue described in 69834 (D-Bus CVE-2014-3636 Denial of Service Vulnerability).

CVE-2014-7825.title: Linux Kernel 'trace_syscalls.c' Multiple Local Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-7825.body: The Linux kernel is prone to multiple local denial-of-service vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. A local attacker can exploit these issues to cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-7826.title: Linux Kernel 'trace_syscalls.c' Multiple Local Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-7826.body: The Linux kernel is prone to multiple local denial-of-service vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. A local attacker can exploit these issues to cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-7828.title: FreeIPA CVE-2014-7828 Remote Security Weakness
CVE-2014-7828.body: FreeIPA is prone to a remote security weakness. Attackers can exploit this issue to perform unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. FreeIPA 4.0 and 4.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-7830.title: Moodle 'mod/feedback/mapcourse.php' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-7830.body: Moodle is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2014-7841.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2014-7841 SCTP NULL Pointer Dereference Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-7841.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow an attacker to crash the kernel resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-7862.title: ManageEngine Desktop Central CVE-2014-7862 Remote Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-7862.body: ManageEngine Desktop Central is prone to a remote security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2014-7869.title: Drupal Context Form Alteration Module HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-7869.body: The Context Form Alteration module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Context Form Alteration 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-7871.body: Open-Xchange AppSuite is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. An attacker can exploit this issue to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Open-Xchange AppSuite 7.6.0 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-7978.body: The BlueMasters theme for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2014-7989.body: Cisco Unified Computing System B-Series Blade Servers are prone to multiple local privilege escalation vulnerabilities. Local attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary commands with root privileges. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuq38176.

CVE-2014-7990.body: Cisco IOS XE Software is prone to a local security bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions in the context of the affected system. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCur09815.

CVE-2014-7991.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuq86376.

CVE-2014-8071.title: OpenMRS Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-8071.body: OpenMRS is prone to the following vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities. 2. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. 3. A cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. 4. An access-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions, obtain sensitive information, execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, and perform actions in the vulnerable application in the context of the victim. OpenMRS 2.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-8072.title: OpenMRS Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-8072.body: OpenMRS is prone to the following vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities. 2. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. 3. A cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. 4. An access-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions, obtain sensitive information, execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, and perform actions in the vulnerable application in the context of the victim. OpenMRS 2.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-8073.title: OpenMRS Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-8073.body: OpenMRS is prone to the following vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities. 2. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. 3. A cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. 4. An access-bypass vulnerability. CVE-2014-8075.title: Drupal Tribune Module Node Title Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-8075.body: The Tribune module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Tribune 6.x-1.x and 7.x-3.x are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-8077.title: Drupal NewsFlash Theme Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-8077.body: NewsFlash Theme for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Note: Successful exploitation of the issue requires attacker to have 'administer themes' permissions. NewsFlash NewsFlash 6.x-1.x prior to 6.x-1.7 and 7.x-1.x prior to 7.x-2.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-8079.title: Drupal MAYO Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-8079.body: The Mayo module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the vulnerable site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Mayo 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-8081.title: TestLink 'execSetResults.php'  PHP Object Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-8081.body: TestLink is prone to a remote PHP object-injection vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to inject arbitrary object in to the application to delete files, view files and execute local script code and to access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database execute arbitrary PHP code through specially crafted serialized objects. Versions prior to TestLink 1.9.13 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-8082.title: TestLink 'debug_print_backtrace()' Function Information Disclosure Weakness
CVE-2014-8082.body: TestLink is prone to an information-disclosure weakness. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Versions prior to TestLink 1.9.13 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-8088.body: Zend Framework is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit these issues to bypass the authentication mechanism and gain unauthorized access; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2014-8089.body: Zend Framework is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit these issues by manipulating the SQL query logic to carry out unauthorized actions on the underlying database.

Note: This issue was previously titled 'Debian 'request-tracker4' Package CVE-2014-9472 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability'. The title and technical details have been changed to better reflect the underlying component affected.

CVE-2014-9474.title: MPFR 'strtofr.c' Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9474.body: MPFR is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the affected function. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application.

CVE-2014-9482.title: Dwarfdump Use After Free Memory Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9482.body: Dwarfdump is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow local attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application or cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-9495.title: libpng 'png_combine_row()' Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9495.body: libpng is prone to heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user-supplied input. Attackers may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application that uses the affected library. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. libpng 1.6.15 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-9584.title: Linux Kernel 'fs/isofs/rock.c' Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9584.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to cause a memory leak to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2014-9587.title: Roundcube Webmail Multiple Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-9587.body: Roundcube Webmail is prone to multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities because it fails to properly validate HTTP requests. An attacker can exploit these issues to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to Roundcube Webmail 1.0.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-9599.title: b2evolution 'admin.php' Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9599.body: b2evolution is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to have arbitrary script code execute in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. b2evolution 5.2.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-9601.title: Opensuse CVE-2014-9601 Denial-Of-Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9601.body: Opensuse is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Pillow before 2.7.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a compressed text chunk in a PNG image that has a large size when it is decompressed.

CVE-2014-9620.title: file 'src/readelf.c' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9620.body: file is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause excessive resource consumption, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-9636.title: Info-ZIP UnZip Out of Bounds Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9636.body: Info-ZIP UnZip is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow an attacker to crash the application resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible, but has not been confirmed.

CVE-2014-9637.title: GNU patch 'set_hunkmax()' Function Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9637.body: GNU patch is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2014-9644.title: Linux Kernel Crypto API CVE-2014-9644 Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9644.body: Linux kernel is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability that may allow an attacker to bypass file permissions. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.

CVE-2014-9645.title: BusyBox  CVE-2014-9645 Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9645.body: BusyBox is prone to a local security bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.

CVE-2014-9651.title: CHICKEN 'data-structures-tests.scm' Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9651.body: CHICKEN is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-9652.title: PHP libmagick 'src/softmagic.c' Out-of-Bounds Read Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9652.body: PHP libmagic is prone to an out-of-bounds read vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-9653.title: file 'readelf.c' Out-of-Bounds Read Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9653.body: file is prone to an out-of-bounds read vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. file 5.21 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2014-9679.title: CUPS cupsRasterReadPixels Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9679.body: CUPS cupsRasterReadPixels is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2014-9683.title: Linux Kernel 'fs/ecryptfs/crypto.c' Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9683.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Local attackers can exploit this issue to run arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Failed exploit attempts can crash the affected kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2014-9705.title: PHP '/ext/enchant/enchant.c' Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9705.body: PHP is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. This issue is fixed in PHP 5.6.6, 5.5.22 and 5.4.38.

CVE-2014-9709.title: PHP LibGD Extension 'gd_gif_in.c' Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9709.body: PHP LibGD Extension is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information or crash the application resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-9713.title: OpenLDAP CVE-2014-9713 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9713.body: OpenLDAP is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2014-9714.title: HipHop Virtual Machine 'WddxPacket::recursiveAddVar()' Function Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9714.body: HipHop Virtual Machine is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2014-9716.title: WebODF CVE-2014-9716 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9716.body: WebODF is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to WebODF 0.5.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-9718.title: QEMU PRDT Data Handling Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9718.body: QEMU is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the system, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-9728.title: Linux Kernel UDF File System Multiple Local Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-9728.body: The Linux kernel is prone to multiple local denial-of-service vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to cause kernel to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2014-9738.title: Drupal Tournament Module Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-9738.body: Tournament module for Drupal is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker supplied HTML and script code could be executed in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2014-9739.title: Drupal Node Field Module Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-9739.body: The Node Field module for Drupal is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Node Field 7.x-2.x prior to 7.x-2.45 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-9740.title: Drupal RedHen Rules Link Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9740.body: The Rules Link module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the vulnerable site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Rules Link 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.1 are affected.

CVE-2014-9745.title: FreeType 't1load.c' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9745.body: FreeType is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause an infinite loop, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to FreeType 2.5.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-9750.title: NTP 'ntp_crypto.c' Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9750.body: NTP is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2014-9751.title: NTP 'ntp_io.c' Authentication Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9751.body: NTP is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and to perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2014-9760.title: GOsa CVE-2014-9760 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9760.body: GOsa is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2014-9761.title: GNU glibc CVE-2014-9761 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9761.body: GNU glibc is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploits will result in denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to glibc 2.23 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-9762.title: imlib2 CVE-2014-9762 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9762.body: imlib2 is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to imlib2 1.4.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-9763.title: imlib2 CVE-2014-9763 Divide-By-Zero Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9763.body: imlib2 is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may cause crash in the application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to imlib2 1.4.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-9764.title: imlib2 CVE-2014-9764 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9764.body: imlib2 is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to imlib2 1.4.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-9765.title: xdelta3 CVE-2014-9765 Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9765.body: xdelta3 is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to xdelta3 3.0.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-9767.title: PHP 'php_zip.c' Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9767.body: PHP is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers can use specially crafted requests with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to create or overwrite arbitrary files in the context of the application. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2014-9769.title: PCRE 'pcre_jit_compile.c' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9769.body: PCRE is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code-execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. Note : If JIT is disabled, the crash does not happen.

CVE-2014-9862.title: Apple Mac OS X APPLE-SA-2016-07-18-1 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-9862.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code, gain sensitive information, cause denial-of-service conditions, bypass security restrictions, and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in other attacks. Apple Mac OS X 10.9.5, 10.10.5 and 10.11 through 10.11.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-9903.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. Linux kernel 3.14-rc versions prior to 3.14-rc4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-9906.title: DBD::mysql CVE-2014-9906 Incomplete Fix  Use After Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9906.body: DBD::mysql is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-9907.title: ImageMagick CVE-2014-9907 Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-9907.body: ImageMagick is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. A remote attacker may exploit these issue to cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-9911.title: ICU 'uloc_getDisplayName()' Function Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9911.body: ICU is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed exploits may result in denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2014-9912.body: PHP is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. CVE-2014-9914.body: Google Android is prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges within the context of the kernel. This issue is being tracked by Android Bug ID A-32882659.

CVE-2014-9922.body: Linux kernel is prone to multiple local privilege-escalation vulnerabilities. A local attacker may exploit these issues to gain escalated privileges and perform unauthorized actions. Versions prior to Linux kernel 3.18 are vulnerable.

CVE-2014-9935.title: Google Android Qualcomm components Multiple Unspecified Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-9935.body: Google Android is prone to multiple unspecified security vulnerabilities. Little is known about these issues or its effects at this time. We will update this BID as more information emerges. These issues are being tracked by Android Bug ID's A-35445101, A-35434683, A-35442512, A-35439275, A-35444951, A-35442420, A-35445102, A-35445002, A-35444658, A-35432947, A-35441175, A-35445401, A-35441076, A-35445400, A-35442421, A-35440626 and A-35434643

CVE-2014-9940.title: Linux kernel CVE-2014-9940 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2014-9940.body: Linux kernel is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges within the context of the kernel.

CVE-2014-9953.title: Qualcomm Closed-Source Components Multiple Unspecified Vulnerabilities
CVE-2014-9953.body: Qualcomm Closed-Source Components are prone to multiple unspecified vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform unauthorized actions.
